meta.title: Conversational Intelligence | Aviso Sense
meta.description: Aviso Sense captures and analyzes signals to help reps uncover hidden buyer behaviors, take action on at-risk deals, and push winnable ones over the fence faster.

content.subtitle: Aviso Sense
content.title: Drive momentum into every deal with Conversational Intelligence
content.description: Aviso Sense captures and analyzes over 1000+ signals to help reps say more of the right things on every call, execute next-best-actions and drive deals over the finish line faster

content.title: Closing isn’t about more calls. It’s about more effective calls.

items.title: The Deal Blindness problem
items.description:
• No way to know how buyers truly feel on a sales call - interested or politely nodding
  • Reps struggle to understand if buyers are positive or negative about moving forward
  • Guesswork-based rep bias on deals means forecasting goes for a toss
  • Time wasted on manually poring through transcripts or searching for action items
  • Meetings scattered all over the place. No way to quickly pull up calls for reference

items.title: The Aviso Sense Advantage
items.description:
• Emotion analysis reveal unspoken thoughts buyers have through identifying visual and tonal markers
  • Sentiment Analysis shows you which buyers are likely to say yes! Or stall
  • Knowing the true nature of every deal means a 98%+ forecast accuracy
  • Smart Transcripts gives you everything you need to know about any call
  • All your recordings and transcripts in one place means faster collaboration

content.subtitle: NETAPP
content.title: Conversational Intelligence with Aviso is like an X-ray of what’s happening in your sales team. It equips your reps with the tools to produce higher numbers, receive better compensation, and increase customer success
content.description: Lori Harmon, VP Global Renewals & Virtual Sales

logo.label: Aviso Sense

content.subtitle: ADVANCED EMOTION & SENTIMENT ANALYSIS
content.title: Know the buyer like the back of your hand
content.description: No more false positives. Understand the real status of every deal. Prioritize winnable deals, drive at-risk deals back on track and set more reliable forecasts

items.title: Emotion Analysis
items.description: NLP-based insights reveal hiddens cues that highlight buyer feelings about your product/ service
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.title: Sentiment Analysis
items.description: Deep Learning models and aspect-based sentiment analysis shows you who's positively disposed and who’s likely to stall
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.title: Buyer Intent
items.description: Aviso Sense mines customer intent through analyzing data from every touchpoint so you prioritize the right deals
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

content.subtitle: SMART TRANSCRIPTIONS & AUTO-SUMMARIZATION
content.title: Hours of meetings. Insights in minutes
content.description: Advanced NLP models generate all the insights you need on every call in a single, easy-to-consume report. Control every call by being fully prepared, handle questions and destroy objections.

items.title: Smart visual summaries
items.description: No more note-taking. Know the keywords highlighted, the thoughts of decision-makers and next steps to take
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.title: Call Prep Guide
items.description: Know the questions buyers asked around key focus areas, the competitors named and objections raised
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.title: Lightning Share
items.description: Easily send the smart transcript to your executives and buyers. Bring everyone on the same page

items.title: 1-click Snippets
items.description: Avoid enduring endless recordings to get to one action item. Easily share call snippets and add timestamps and comments
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

content.subtitle: SEAMLESS INTEGRATION WITH DEAL ROOMS
content.title: From chaos to collaboration. One collective space
content.description: All your reps. All your deals. All the calls in every deal-current, past and scheduled. All in one place. So you can review deal progress, gauge rep-buyer relationships, and coach with precision

items.title: Instant Scheduling
items.description: Quickly set up meetings inside Deal Rooms using any web conference platform-all calls are still logged into Deal Rooms.
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm3.707-9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd" /></svg>

items.description: Track every meeting. Find all the call recordings linked to a deal in a single space for easy review

items.description: Search, find and analyze any call linked to any deal based on different filters like pricing mention, competitor names, etc.

content.title: Aviso works at the frontier of predictive AI to help teams close more deals and drive more revenue.

items.title: - Charles Forsgard
items.subtitle: VP Sales, Honeywell
items.description: Aviso Conversational Intelligence (CI) gives insights right to the seller and at the same time, it gives insights to me (the sales leader) on what I should really be coaching the seller on right now, in their pipeline

items.title: - Anjai 'AJ' Gandhi
items.subtitle: Chief Growth Officer, Marlin Equity Partners
items.description: We really like what Aviso is doing. Combining multiple key selling capabilities like deal management, forecasting, conversational intelligence. Every company needs these capabilities and it's great to see these forming into a suite instead of just point solutions

items.title: - Craig Pratt
items.subtitle: Next Level Leader
items.description: Aviso has become the next generation transformational platform for Revenue Operations (CRO/VP of Ops) who are betting the farm on leveraging the platform for forecast, relationship, and conversational intelligence just to name a few. I've spoken with CROs of high tech unicorns who spend 90% of his time in Aviso on CRM

items.title: - Bill Heil
items.subtitle: Former COO, VMWare
items.description: I continue to be impressed by Trevor Templar's vision, relentless execution, team, platform, and all the Aviso customers that see value. Conversation AI is a game changer and a great example delivering new value this year. Simplifying the GTM stack provides hard savings as well
